course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Academic and Professional Development I
course.description: This course is designed to provide academic advising to enhance personal and professional skills for ISD students throughout their 4 years of study. Activities involve workshops and a mentoring program. For ISD students only. Graded P, PP or F.

reviews.author: JeremyWK
reviews.title: Don't need to worry
reviews.comment_content: Just require you to chat with your advisor once a semester. Your advisor wouldn't find your unless you find them.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Actually professor of ISDN are quite nice and caring student, maybe not only ISDN's most of the professor are good.
In that chat, your professor would ask about how you are doing in HKUST, any trouble. Also CAN (not a must) talk about your study plan if you have, he/ she will give comment on that too.
Pain point is that the advising booking system is like most of the systems in HKUST, not functionable. The message system are suck. So if you need to contact with your advisor, email them is much efficient.
reviews.comment_grading: P/ F. Get P just need to book and meet him/ her once. I have heard someone only talk less than 5mins also be fine.
reviews.comment_workload: I think most of the workload is contacting your advisor.
